wikipedia_page.main: Norman Budd (1914–2006) was a British-born actor in American films and television. He also acted on stage.

* Norman Budd as Pvt. Lou Radtke

Million Dollar Pursuit is a 1951 film noir crime film directed by R.G. Springsteen and starring Penny Edwards, Grant Withers and Norman Budd.Martin p.470 The film's art direction was by Frank Hotaling.
